{{ "$" + (chart.percent * 100).toFixed(0) }}
{{ chart.day }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Chart } from '../models/Chart'; import { ChartService } from '../services/chart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chart', templateUrl: './chart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chart.component.scss'], }) export class ChartComponent implements OnInit { charts$!: Observable; constructor(private chartService: ChartService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.charts$ = this.chartService.getDataCharts() } }
